__e: I can't just sit idly by and do nothing.
Okay, lie still, and we'll see what's going on.
And then I hear, like rustling of clothes and then nothing, and- and I know that he's sitting in that chair, not moving, and that's all that I know.
But I can't move,.. ..so I stand still as he touches me.
She's been immobile for the past four days, so it has to be there, but I've searched everywhere.
Will you please hold it still while I'm doing this?
